lead_paragraph: ROSS--Alan Gordon. Alan, you were so right about so many people and things. Your perspicacity still overwhelms us after 15 years. You'd love Tom. We love you. The Ross Family 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  ROSS, ALAN GORDON

snippet: ROSS--Alan Gordon. Alan, you were so right about so many people and things. Your perspicacity still overwhelms us after 15 years. You'd love Tom. We love you. The Ross Family 1/3
